iiv.display

Interface LocationMapping

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CNUStdImgFile, ComponentGroup, DisplayBox, DisplayColorMap, DisplayColorMapQuilt, DisplayComponent, DisplayDraw, DisplayLine, DisplayOval, DisplayShape, DisplayText, IntensityProjectionImage, ScriptableDisplayComponent, ShowPointDisplayLine, SingleImg

    public interface LocationMapping
    LocationMapping defines routines to allow handling display location mapping for a component.
    Since:
    iiV1.132
    See Also:
    CNUDisplay, DisplayComponent

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Point displayLocation(java.awt.Point pt)
      Calculates a components display location converting from a components primary display objects such as an image relative location correcting for objects location and/or filters (ie flip, zoom and crop)
      java.awt.Point trueLocation(java.awt.Point pt)
      Calculates point location in the components primary display object such as an image from a component relative location correcting for objects location and/or filters (ie flip, zoom and crop)

    • Method Detail

      • trueLocation

        java.awt.Point trueLocation(java.awt.Point pt)
        Calculates point location in the components primary display object such as an image from a component relative location correcting for objects location and/or filters (ie flip, zoom and crop)
        Parameters:
        pt - location in component
        Returns:
        location in original image with no filtering

      • displayLocation

        java.awt.Point displayLocation(java.awt.Point pt)
        Calculates a components display location converting from a components primary display objects such as an image relative location correcting for objects location and/or filters (ie flip, zoom and crop)
        Parameters:
        pt - location in original image with no filtering
        Returns:
        location in component
